    "visual_description": "A person is walking a dog on a leash in a park at night. Trees are visible in the background, and there are some lights. The person is wearing a dark red shirt and shorts.",
    "characters": ["Man 1", "Dog"],
    "dialogue": "אה, אה, אה, אה,",
    "mood_tone": "Casual, everyday activity",
    "keywords": ["park", "night", "dog", "walking", "outdoors"],
    "frame_path": "uploads/session_id/frames/frame_0001_t0.0s.jpg"

  {
    "scene_number": 2,
    "timestamp": "00:13 - 00:32",
    "time_sec": 13.0,
    "location": "Park at night",
    "visual_description": "A man is standing in a park at night, talking on a phone. He is wearing a dark red shirt and shorts. The background shows trees and lights. He appears to be mid-conversation.",
    "characters": ["Man 1"],
    "dialogue": "כן. היי, עצקו, מה קורה אחי? ככה הרבה זמן לחזורה. כן, סורי, אולי, עם דברים על הראש. מה, על מרצי תלדבר? מה, אתה עם הכלבה עכשיו? כן, אני מרדן, הטיול על לי, את יודעת. על מרצי תלדבר? עצקו?",
    "mood_tone": "Conversational, slightly apologetic",
    "keywords": ["park", "night", "phone call", "conversation", "apology"],
    "frame_path": "uploads/session_id/frames/frame_0002_t13.0s.jpg"
  },
  {
    "scene_number": 3,
    "timestamp": "00:32 - 00:45",
    "time_sec": 32.0,
    "location": "Park at night",
    "visual_description": "A man is sitting on a bench in a park at night, looking thoughtful. He is wearing a dark red shirt. The lighting is dim, with trees and some distant lights in the background. He seems to be listening or contemplating.",
    "characters": ["Man 1"],
    "dialogue": "יצקו התנתקנו, אה... דבר איתי, ביי. אתה אה, זהו, לא מדברת אותו. למה, מה קרה? נשבר לי, אחי, כל פשוט נתקשר להם, אומרים, נחזור אליך בלילה. למה? למה, כן, טוב, לא רק שום תהיל עם הכלבה שלו, בלילה. אתה קולט, אני חבר כלבה. אתה מה?",
